:MSLHeader
//MSLHeader = Media Server List Header

//::<Location> 
//eg ::HK ::Loopback

//::Loopback means the server is running within the same server with Central Server
//<ip>#<port number>

::HK

x12homeserver.no-ip.org#17222
123.202.83.57#17221

::Loopback
192.168.1.100#17221
127.0.0.1#17221
